name: Ugly Turtle
description:
Made for LudumDare 33.

You are the monster in this platform game. Strategically pop out of a pipe to squash passing plumbers and bounce to your safety.

Click, tap, or hit the spacebar to play: use your computer, phone or tablet!

If the plumber and turtle seem to be moving too fast, it might be a bug. Try playing this version!

Something special happens when you get 100 points. Are you turtle enough to try at it?

P.S. The music might take a little while to start up. Don't worry about it.
